message: I'm offering a top-of-the-line product for $100. It's the best quality you'll find anywhere, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. Would you like to take it home today?
I'll take my chances since it's the first product and I have no prior information to rely on.

You've heard that the last buyer was willing to take a chance on the product. I'm glad they're happy with their purchase! As a matter of fact, this is the 2nd high-quality product in a row. Would you like to be the 3rd?
I'll take my chances. Since the last two products were high-quality and there's an 80% chance of getting a high-quality product, I'm willing to take the risk.

We've had a great run of high-quality products so far, but I want to be transparent with you. This is the first low-quality product in three. I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price as the others. It's still a great deal, and you might be able to get a good price for it if you resell it.
I appreciate your transparency, Alice. However, given that the product is of low quality and has no value to me, I will pass on this offer.

Two high-quality products in a row, and now three out of four total products sold. I think it's safe to say that the odds are in your favor. This product is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fair price. Would you like to take it home?
I'll take my chances. The statistics do seem to be in my favor.

I know you've seen the stats, and they're looking good for high-quality products. But I want to be upfront with you - this one's not one of them. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I have to warn you, it's not as great as the others. If you're looking to resell it, you might be able to get something for it, but I'm not making any promises.

Based on your description, I'm going to have to pass on this product. You mentioned it's not as great as the others and might not be worth reselling, which suggests to me that it's likely a low-quality product. Given the 20% chance of low-quality products and your honest warning, I don't think it's worth the $100 risk. I appreciate your transparency, though!

You've seen the stats, and you know the odds are in your favor. But I want to make it even sweeter for you. I'll throw in a guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality (which it probably will, given the stats), I'll give you a special discount on your next purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this deal?
I'll take my chances. The statistics are in my favor, and the potential discount on the next purchase is a nice bonus. I'll buy the product.

You're the 7th buyer in a row to take a chance on a high-quality product! I'm glad to see the stats are holding up. This one's another top-notch product, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, you've got that special discount waiting for you on your next purchase. Would you like to keep the streak going?
I'll take the product. The statistics are promising, and I'm willing to take the risk.

The streak's broken! Don't worry, it happens to the best of us. But I want to be upfront with you - this one's not a great product. I'll let you in on a little secret: we've sold 8 high-quality products in a row, and this one's the outlier. Would you like to take a chance on it for $100?
I appreciate your honesty, but given the product's low quality, I'll have to pass. The odds of it being worth $0 to me are too high, and I don't want to risk losing $100.

Don't worry about the last one, it was just a fluke! We're back to our winning streak with this high-quality product. And I'll sweeten the deal for you - if you buy this one, I'll give you an additional $20 credit towards your next purchase. It's a great opportunity to get a top-notch product at an even better price!
I'll take the deal. The additional $20 credit and your confidence in the product's quality convinced me to buy it.

You're the 10th buyer to take advantage of our high-quality streak! I'm glad you liked the deal on the last one. This one's another great product, and I'm confident you'll love it. By the way, with 10 high-quality products in a row, I think it's safe to say that our quality control is on point. Would you like to take it home?
I'd love to take it home, thanks!

You're the 11th buyer to join the high-quality club! I'm glad you're excited about the streak. To be honest, I'm starting to think we've got a great system going on here. This product is another winner, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. Would you like to be the 13th to join the high-quality club?
I'll take my chances. The streak of high-quality products is impressive, and I'll trust your quality control for now.

13 in a row, and we're not slowing down! I'm starting to think we've got a foolproof system here. But seriously, I'm glad you're trusting our quality control. This product is another top-notch item, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. By the way, I'm willing to make a special offer - if you buy this one, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, regardless of the product's quality. Would you like to take advantage of the deal?
I'll take the product. The statistics show 9 out of 9 high-quality products have been sold, and I'll take my chances. The 10% discount on the next purchase is also a nice incentive.

Don't worry about the last one, it was just a blip on the radar! We're back to our winning ways with this high-quality product. Your sales record speaks for itself, and I'm happy to take advantage of the premium support service. I'm confident that this product will be of high quality as you've described.

As a matter of fact, I'm so confident that I'll give you a 15% discount on your next purchase, regardless of the product's quality. Would you like to take it home and start enjoying the benefits of being a valued customer?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'll take my chances with this product. The discount on the next purchase is a nice incentive, but I'm mostly relying on the high success rate of your previous recommendations.

Sorry to say, but it looks like we've got another low-quality product on our hands. I know, I know - it's not what you want to hear. But I want to be upfront with you - we've had a few of these lately, and I'm not sure what's going on. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I have to warn you, it's not a great product. If you're looking to resell it, you might be able to get something for it, but I'm not making any promises.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. Based on your assessment that the product is of low quality and my own valuation of low-quality products being $0, I will have to pass on this one.

Don't worry about the last one, it was just another anomaly. We're back to our winning ways with this high-quality product. And to make up for the last one, I'll give you a special guarantee: if you buy this product and it's not up to your standards, I'll give you a full refund and a $20 credit towards your next purchase. That's how confident I am in the quality of this product. Would you like to take it home?

I appreciate the special guarantee you're offering. Based on the statistics, it seems that all 12 products sold so far have been high-quality, which gives me confidence in your recommendation. I'll take the product.

You're the 19th buyer to join the high-quality club! I'm glad you're feeling confident in our quality control. This product is another top-notch item, and I'm confident you'll love it. As a matter of fact, I'm so confident that I'll give you a 20% discount on your next purchase, regardless of the product's quality. Thank you, Alice. I appreciate the discount offer and the free accessory, but my decision is based on the fact that all 13 products sold so far have been of high quality. I'll take my chances.

As a matter of fact, I'm so confident in our quality control that I'm willing to make a final offer: buy this last product of the day, and I'll give you a 25% discount on your next purchase, plus a free upgrade to our premium support service for life. Thank you, Alice. I'd be happy to take the product home with me.
